newsitem.title: SPAIN: SOCCER-REAL MADRID RECOVER TO BEAT RACING 2-1.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-REAL MADRID RECOVER TO BEAT RACING 2-1.

text.p: Real Madrid regained their nine-point lead over Barcelona and Real Betis at the top of the Spanish championship after recovering from a goal down to beat Racing Santander 2-1 on Monday.
Raul Gonzalez and Clarence Seedorf sealed victory in a three-minute period midway through the second half after Racing keeper Jose Ceballos misjudged through balls.
Earlier, Racing had squandered three clear chances to add to Fernando Correa's 45th minute headed goal.
